content: MCP Tools Testing Summary - Fixed critical issues and identified available tools: (1) complete-test v1: Ran 5 iterations, score 53/100, found 6 issues, auto-fixed 7 (2) Found and fixed duplicate loading="lazy" JSX attributes in RedTagDashboard and JobPhotoGallery - build now clean (3) complete-test-v2 added to config but needs restart to load (4) Available high-impact MCPs: pagespeed (Core Web Vitals), memory-bank (project docs), language-server (TS diagnostics - needs config), image-downloader (optimize images), seo-mcp (backlinks/keywords) (5) Deployed fixes to production via GitHub push
